title: $49+ O/W Virgin America Sale Flights
text:
Home > Flight Deals > $49+ O/W Virgin America Sale Flights $49+ O/W Virgin America Sale Flights August 14, 2015 2:24pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
Nonstop fall flights to popular points of interest within the U.S., including Austin, Las Vegas, Los Angles, and New York City are discounted in Virgin America's limited-time airfare sale. For the lowest rates, tickets must be booked at least 21 days in advance and by 11:59 p.m. CT on August 18. Virgin America's sale fares start at $49 one-way ($98 round-trip). 
Travel on most routes is valid during September 8 - November 18. See the sale provider for route-specific travel restrictions. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: We found the best prices for the travel window of these sales by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros: Nonstop flights on popular routes. Cons: Not all routes are the absolute cheapest. Verdict:
